name: Albertoattia.GitHub.io
body:
Hi, I'm Alberto
I want to enhance relationships between humans, so I design conversations between humans and machines. But I'm scared of the day when we're not able to tell the difference. 

Check this article: [AI is scary](https://medium.com/@aattia/im-afraid-dave-ae4b9db3dacd#.ayqo6l7ky)

Mira este art√≠culo: [La vida moderna](https://medium.com/@aattia/la-vida-moderna-b395f3e5291e#.xhwhpvoer)
